urn:lsid:ipni.org:names:77154753-1,,Raz,Dioscorea confusa,Dioscoreaceae,,Dioscorea,,confusa,,false,false,spec.,Phytotaxa 258(1): 31. 2016 [26 Apr 2016] [epublished],2016,Raz,urn:lsid:ipni.org:publications:20011462-1,Raz@20030138-1@1@aut,,,,Phytotaxa,,,nom. nov.,258(1): 31,,,,,,false,,,,,,,,,,"nom. inval.    Raz lectoypified the name Rajania wrightii Uline ex R.Knuth 1917 and proposed  “D. confusa” as a replacement name for R. wrightii [non D. wrightii Uline ex R. Knuth 1917].  Unfortunately, her lectotypification excluded the original type material of R. wrightii, and therefore Raz’s intended new name “D. confusa” was inadvertently published as a new species name.  Since Raz used the term lectotype (not type or holotype), the name “D. confusa” was not validly published (see Melbourne Code Art. 40 Ex. 5, 48.1)",,,nom. inval.,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,2016 [26 Apr 2016],[26 Apr 2016],,[epublished],doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.258.1.2,,,,,,,false,true,,,,
